meanings.definition: A disease caused by bacteria of the genus Actinomyces.
meanings.sent1: Actinomycoses can be treated with antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with actinomycoses.
meanings.sent3: The actinomycoses in the patient's body decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Actinomycoses spread through the body like tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The word actinomycoses sounds like a group of tiny soldiers marching.

meanings.sent1: The lab results showed multiple cases of actinomycoses.
meanings.sent2: Actinomycoses can affect different parts of the body.
meanings.sent3: The actinomycoses in the lab sample seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the field of medicine, actinomycoses are like a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent5: The term actinomycoses is used when referring to multiple instances of the disease.
